attributes.action: ensure a thorough investigation under Section 8 of the Asylum and Immigration Act 1996 into the employers of persons subject to immigration control in the security services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Had I employed just one person subject to immigration control I would expect to be investigated under section 8 yet I understand 5,000 are currently employed in the Security Services and yet there has been no arrest that I have heard about. Why not?
